title: QueryElevationComponent should be reloadable w/o commit
description: It would be helpful if you could reload the elevation rules without having to do a commit and reloading the core.

comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
comments.content:
Related: reload synonyms without having to do a commit and reloading the core (n.b. reloading the core doesn't seem to actually reload synonyms.txt currently anyway!)
See http://search-lucene.com/m/2ExL22IsDPk1/otis&subj=Reloading+synonyms+txt+without+downtime

SOLR-1307 seems to be related.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: I don't think a commit does reload it anymore? See SOLR-1607
